TopicTitle: Google+ pages for fictional aerospace agencies

Articles.Content:
So I just got a really cool idea. For those of us on here that have fictional aerospace agencies, why don\'t we make Google+ pages for them? We could post mission status updates or show off our latest reliable launch vehicles for getting to Minmus or the Mun. Then we could all circle each other and do hangouts or something. And as a bonus, if anyone were to stumble upon our little community and start sharing our posts, boom, publicity. I\'m not sure exactly what I\'m going to do with my agency, but I\'m sure I\'ll come up with stuff as I play. So who\'s with me?

NOTE: If you have a Google account, chances are you already have a G+ account as well. If you don\'t want to use Google+ personally, you could just ignore your personal profile and make the G+ page.

EDIT: Random question: is the name Nexus Aerospace already taken?

hmmm....

nice idea!

Maybe Gold Stingray is interested. PM luigibro606 cause he\'s the boss.
